summary.span: 指定主题字典在程序集中的存储位置。

span.span: Specifies the location in which theme dictionaries are stored for an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在程序集级别使用此属性以指示正在为其定义的控件，程序集声明的主题资源字典和资源字典所在的位置。This attribute is used at the assembly level to indicate which theme resource dictionaries are being declared by an assembly for its defined controls, and where the resource dictionaries are located. 例如，如果未提供特定于主题的资源字典和你`generic.xaml`将提供针对所有资源查找的资源定义编译为程序集的控件类定义存在同一程序集，你将应用以下特性在`AssemblyInfo.cs`在程序集项目：For example, if you do not provide theme-specific resource dictionaries, and your `generic.xaml` that supplies resource definitions for all resource lookups is compiled into the same assembly in which the assembly's control class definitions exist, you would apply the following attribution in the `AssemblyInfo.cs` for the assembly project: `[assembly:ThemeInfoAttribute(ResourceDictionaryLocation.None, ResourceDictionaryLocation.SourceAssembly)]` 除了应用程序、 你的项目和程序集必须具有用于为可由 WPF 主题系统使用的资源字典顺序的其他特性。In addition to application, your project and assembly must have additional characteristics in order for the resource dictionaries to be usable by the WPF theming system. - 如果你声明，然后引用的资源字典应放置于`themes`目录中的程序集结构。If you declare , then the referenced resource dictionary should be placed within a `themes` directory in the assembly structure. - 如果你声明为，然后的 XAML 文件的名称应符合 XAML 文件的命名方案`themes\..xaml`。If you declare for , then the names of the XAML files are expected to conform to the XAML file naming scheme `themes\..xaml`. 例如，下面是在客户端支持的各种可能的 WPF 主题方案的主题文件的列表：For example, the following is a list of theme files that support a variety of possible WPF theming scenarios on clients: - `themes\luna.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\luna.homestead.xaml` - `themes\luna.metallic.xaml` - `themes\royale.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\aero.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\classic.xaml` - 如果你声明、 然后预期的外部程序集名称以符合的命名方案，并且应使用相同的密钥信息生成每个主题的每个程序集。If you declare , then the external assembly names are expected to conform to a naming scheme, and each assembly for each theme should be built using the same key information. 有关如何创建和使用主题资源字典的详细信息，请参阅"在的主题级别定义资源"主题的部分[控件创作概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。For more information about how to create and use theme resource dictionaries, see "Defining Resources at the Theme Level" section of the topic [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md).

Luna.NormalColor-在 Windows XP 上的默认蓝色主题。Luna.NormalColor - Default blue theme on Windows XP. Luna.Homestead – Windows XP 上橄榄主题。Luna.Homestead – Olive theme on Windows XP. Luna.Metallic – Windows XP 上银级主题。Luna.Metallic – Silver theme on Windows XP.
